ygData.subject: Mystic Daggers and the List
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings everyone. I made the choice, long ago, to use a dagger as my melee weapon as opposed to a staff of some sort. Now I am finding that everyone is
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings everyone. I made the choice, long ago, to use a dagger as my
melee weapon as opposed to a staff of some sort. Now I am finding that
everyone is speaking of magical staves, and never see talk of magical
daggers. Would any of you happen to know where I might be able to find
myself a runed dagger of some sort?
Thanks much for the answers!

BTW I think a news group version of this list would be a great idea. I like
the list alot, but trying to read 100+ messages every morning before I
leave for classes kind of sucks.
Garret E. Albritton (Defender)
Frontier of Reality Productions
defender@...
ICQ UIN 31923886
